availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles C. Eaves (Henderson Co, KY, attorney and state rep)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, attorney and politician. Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, native. Son of John S. Eaves and Lurena Ingraham Eaves. Married to Martha G. Beech Eaves in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, on March 24, 1852. Father of Rufus Eaves, Frances Eaves, Charles P. Eaves, Ridley Eaves, Ruth B. Eaves, and Marinda Eaves. Admitted to the bar in 1846. Attorney in Muhlenberg County in 1850. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1857 to 1859. Attorney in Muhlenberg County in 1860.
